title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 9977.6 - Statement of charges (plain language summary)
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 9977.6 - Statement of charges (plain language summary)

State Regulations

For any hearing or proceeding in which a violation of a code
of ethics, local law, ordinance, or resolution or of General Municipal Law, section
811 or
812 is alleged, the notice of hearing or
proceeding shall contain a plain language statement of the violations which are
the subject of the hearing or proceeding. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
9977.6

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
